subtitle: Because of it's well-defined API structure, the ohmage ecosystem contains many 'single-purpose' clients that have been contributed by the ohmage community. As an administrator you are welcome to include or exclude any of these pieces in your installation as needed.  If you'd like to see each in action, please visit the sandbox (which includes each client listed below!)

items.title: Survey Taking
items.details: Browser-based data collection tool. Mimics the functionality of the mobile app in the browser for those without Android or iOS devices

items.title: Data Exploration: Campaign Monitoring
items.details: Campaign progress tracking tool. Helps project coordinators track the data collection of their participants

items.title: Data Exploration: Interactive Dashboard
items.details: An interactive dashboard which incorporates the overview first; zoom and filter; details on-demand design pattern.

items.title: Data Exploration: Plot App
items.details: R-based data exploration. Allows for complex data analysis without requiring technical expertise. Requires opencpu.

items.title: Management: Class Setup
items.details: Class creation tool. Catered toward the Mobilize/LAUSD use-case, but enables easy class creation for all.

items.title: Management: Campaign Authoring
items.details: Interactive campaign creation. Allows project coordinators to quickly define campaigns, which as the container for surveys, are the cornerstone of the ohmage system.

items.title: Management: GWT Web frontend
items.details: The classic ohmage 2.x frontend. Provides the ability for users to view history of responses as well as lists of classes and campaigns to which they belong. Additionally contains some admin features for those with the admin role.
